description: The primary identifier (e.g., ISBN) of the book. This column appears in the report if data is organized by book.
name: Primary_ISBN

description: A Book Visit is registered each time a unique user views one of your books on Google Books. This number includes informational page views (such as the "About this book" page) as well as preview content page views.
name: Book_Visits_BV_

description: The number of Book Visits in which users accessed preview pages of your book. This doesn't include visits where a user accessed only informational pages for your books.
name: BV_with_Pages_Viewed

description: The number of clicks on links for purchasing the book on retailer websites (including your website, if you provided a buy link).
name: Non_Unique_Buy_Clicks

description: The number of visits which included a click on a purchase link.
name: BV_with_Buy_Clicks

description: The clickthrough rate for purchase links. The values are percentages.
name: Buy_Link_CTR

description: The total number of unique preview content pages that a user viewed in a given session (counted as a 24-hour period). If a user views the same page of your book twice during a session, only a single page view is registered.
name: Pages_Viewed
release_date
description: Last day of the release month. Table is partitioned on this column.
